xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/873144-Avant-Garde 1927-1937 SURREALISM AND EXPERIMENT IN BELGIAN CINEMA 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jPhASau7qinvznKDzQMXQS6ta40.jpg At the end of the nineteen twenties, two future film-makers discover their medium. Charles Dekeukeleire and Henri Storck will become famous documentary film-makers, but their debuts consist of experiments and the search of a 'pure cinema'. With the occasional surrealists Henri d'Ursel and Ernst Moerman, they make up the first avant-garde generation in Belgian cinema. Avant-Garde 1927-1937 SURREALISM AND EXPERIMENT IN BELGIAN CINEMA
